text: Yakshcho My damo yiy sprobuvaty mylosti pislya lykha, yake torknulosya yiyi, to vona neodminno skazhe: «Tse — dlya mene! YA ne dumayu, shcho nastane Chas. Ale yakshcho mene povernutʹ do moho Hospoda, to bilya Nʹoho mene chekatyme shchosʹ naykrashche!» My spovistymo neviruyuchykh pro te, shcho vony robyly, a takozh damo yim skushtuvaty suvoroyi kary
